extendedInfo.description: NETGEAR genie App is an easy, way to manage, monitor and repair your home network--from the palm of your hand. While on your home network NETGEAR genie app allows you anywhere-in-the-house access to all the cool features on your router without having to boot up your computer: Wireless Settings, Network Map, Live Parental Controls, Guest Access, Traffic Metering, My Media, and more.  All you need is your tablet or smartphone and NETGEAR genie App.  â¢	Easily control your home network through the genie dashboard â¢	Stream Mediaâfind and play music and video files anywhere in your network from your smartphone/tabletâ¢	Print from your iPadÂ® or iPhoneÂ®--Windows or Mac genie makes any printer AirPrintÂ® compatibleâ¢	Securely connect smartphones and tablets to your home wireless network with the scan of a QR code thanks to EZ Mobile Connect ****** IMPORTANT NOTES ******NETGEAR genie does not work when connected to the guest network of the router.NETGEAR genie only works when connected to a NETGEAR router in router mode, not in access point mode. NETGEAR genie does not work with wireless extender or repeater.NETGEAR genie currently does not support IPv6, login would fail if IPv6 is enabled.For any issue, please contact netgeargenie@netgear.com.Android version supported: Android 2.2 or higherGeneral Information: To use the NETGEAR Genie App, the Android device must be connected to one of the supported NETGEAR routers listed as below:WiFi Routers:Â» R6300Â» R6200Â» Centria (WNDR4700, WND4720)Â» WNDR4500Â» WNDR4300Â» WNDR4000Â» WNDR3800Â» WNDR3700v3Â» WNDR3400v2Â» WNR3500Lv2Â» WNR2200Â» WNR2000v3Â» WNR1500Â» WNR1000v2Â» WNR1000v3Â» WNDRMACÂ» WNR612v2DSL Modem Gateway:Â» D6300Â» DGND4000Â» DGND3700v2Â» DGN2200v3Â» DGN1000Â My Media: My Media uses the default media player on an Android device to play media files if the Android device is being used as a player. Different Android versions support different ranges of media formats. The following list is based on Android version 4.0 supported media formats:â¢ Supported audio formats: AAC, HE-AAC, AMR-NB, AMR-WB, FLAC, MP3, MIDI, Vorbis, and PCM/WAVE.â¢ Supported video formats: H.263, H.264 AVC, MPEG-4 SP, and VP8. â¢ Supported photo formats: JPEG, GIF, PNG, BMP, and WEBP. For more information on supported media formats, see the Technical Specifications for your Android device. Please note when using My Media:1) Each supported media format has limitations in media encoding parameters, such as bitrate, frame rate, and resolution. When My Media is unable to play media files with the supported formats, it may be because the files have higher bitrates or frame rates that exceed the rate it can support. 2) The devices listed in Player view will be your own device, and other devices available in the network, such as PCs, TVs, stereos, or smartphones. 3) The Android NETGEAR Genie needs to be running in the My Media function to show up as a player or source.4) Some media files can be played in some players, but canât be played in other players. Different player supports different kinds of media file formats. For more information, see the Technical Specifications for the player. 5) If My Media canât find any source or any player, it may be because your device is disconnected from the NETGEAR router. Make sure it is connected to the NETGEAR router by checking the Wi-Fi connection in Settings.      6) After any change in the network, including Wi-Fi setting, source folder change, and list of player change, you will need to restart the media service and refresh the source folder in the Option view. 7) When playing media files on your own Android device, tapping the screen brings up play progress and player control.8) It sometimes takes a long time to access and play a media file. This may be caused by a slow network, large file size, or heavy load in the player or source device.

reviews.comment: I\'m not even understanding the purpose of this app. The options are very sparse, and it doesn\'t seem to have support for dual band models. It just seems to be an overview or your network at a glance.
reviews.author: Brandon Southwell

reviews.title: Router not found or supported
reviews.comment: I have the r6300 and everytime I open the genie app to login it tells me it cannot find my router or is not supported worked in the previous version but not the new one.
reviews.author: Eric Jones

reviews.title: Can\'t log in.
reviews.comment: When trying to log in I get an error telling me my network is not stable and to try again later, using a WNDR4500.
reviews.author: Mark Williams

reviews.title: Can not get to work
reviews.comment: Can not login, I\'m pretty sure when I had it before it work, can\'t remember. Now I just get a timed out error seconds after trying to log in, also can not get parental controls to load on the PC application., thank you I will. Look forward to trying it.
reviews.author: Ryan Jay

reviews.title: Never works
reviews.comment: \"the network is not stable, please try again\" all the time.
reviews.author: Andrew Wright

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Since the update now the app has been working excellent for me thank you guys
reviews.author: tino lopez

reviews.title: Not supported
reviews.comment: I have Samsung galaxy s2 and when I tried to install app in my device it shows error. .that could not installed on usb storage ir sd card!!!! Wat does it mean ?
reviews.author: Smit Patel

reviews.title: Unable to put a password on my router
reviews.comment: My computer went out so I set the wireless connection thru my phone. It will not allow me to lock a password in for security
reviews.author: DANEEKA Booker

reviews.title: Excellent app
reviews.comment: I\'ve used this app for sometime noe and love it. As a result quick tool to check who or what is connected, how, signal strength and speed it is great. Sadly ut keeps getting removed when I reboot my phone st the moment.
reviews.author: Robyn Peel

reviews.title: Meh
reviews.comment: I cant connect on my phone. :(  I reset the router and I can login on my laptop, but id prefer to have access via my app. It keeps saying my password is  wrong.
reviews.author: Danielle Wineinger

reviews.title: Not working
reviews.comment: I had this app for some time and it was working fine but now I get an error saying that the network is unstable. I already emailed tech support but no answer not even a received email message. I\'m using a WNDR4500 with a Samsung galaxy s 3.
reviews.author: Armando Fabela

reviews.title: Pretty cool
reviews.comment: I like the ability for it to use my xbox as a player for music. But has audio issues once in awhile. Will give 5 stars when that\'s fixed
reviews.author: Jak Gold

reviews.title: Crap
reviews.comment: Works like crap. Stopped picking up my media share even though no settins changed. This app causes me anger and frustration. I am starting to hate netgear!
reviews.author: Allison T

reviews.title: When it works its great, But often does not work
reviews.comment: So often when I try to log in it errors and says it does not recognize my router or not supported. I have a Netgear DGN2000.  It is very frustrating.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: limited
reviews.comment: very very limited. better off to use the web interface of your device. does not support the 5ghz network even though my device is listed as a supported device.
reviews.author: Go Hoppers

reviews.title: Ridiculous
reviews.comment: Honestly buying anything netgear was a mistake. Why would I assume this app would help. Honestlly buy ANYTHING other then a netgear product. Seriously hate myself for buying the R6300.
reviews.author: Chris Micek

reviews.comment: I really like how user friendly this app is. My favorite feature is that I can access my router from anywhere in my house... I would give it 5 stars if it would stop disappearing from my phone and if the guest account password feature and time feature actually worked.. Thanks for a great app guys :-)
reviews.author: Fran Jankowski

reviews.title: LPC - works, but without security from what I see
reviews.comment: Bought a netgear modem a while back thinking that I could limit the sites that my kids can access while they are supposed to be doing homework.  Works on PC, but I could only recently get it working on android devices.  HOWEVER, once you log into the genie app, even though you select which bypass account you want to use, you still have access as administrator - so LPC is still effectively open.  Shouldn\'t you be able to log in using the bypass username and password instead of as admin first?  Whats the point?
reviews.author: MichaelBina RiedlShah

reviews.title: Nice try
reviews.comment: Not really impressed with this app.  Seems useless.  The only additional functionality I see this providing is the ability to print from iphone and ipad.  I use an android.  Oh well, the boss will like it.
reviews.author: Brian Kelleher

reviews.title: Lame
reviews.comment: This app is pointless.. offers no control over router... Only shows you status like signal strength. Blah blah blah... Uninstalled
reviews.author: Tim Milker
